Package org.apache.spark.network.shuffle.protocol

Class BlockTransferMessage

java.lang.Object
org.apache.spark.network.shuffle.protocol.BlockTransferMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.spark.network.protocol.Encodable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractFetchShuffleBlocks, BlockPushReturnCode, BlocksRemoved, CorruptionCause, DiagnoseCorruption, FinalizeShuffleMerge, GetLocalDirsForExecutors, LocalDirsForExecutors, MergeStatuses, OpenBlocks, PushBlockStream, RegisterExecutor, RemoveBlocks, RemoveShuffleMerge, StreamHandle, UploadBlock, UploadBlockStream
public abstract class BlockTransferMessage extends Object implements org.apache.spark.network.protocol.Encodable
Messages handled by the ExternalBlockHandler, or by Spark's NettyBlockTransferService. At a high level: - OpenBlock is logically only handled by the NettyBlockTransferService, but for the capability for old version Spark, we still keep it in external shuffle service. It returns a StreamHandle. - UploadBlock is only handled by the NettyBlockTransferService. - RegisterExecutor is only handled by the external shuffle service. - RemoveBlocks is only handled by the external shuffle service. - FetchShuffleBlocks is handled by both services for shuffle files. It returns a StreamHandle.
